alert.note: Alert for Ashley (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 02 at 8:37PM CST until January 02 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN ASHLEY COUNTY...NORTHEASTERN MOREHOUSE AND NORTHERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 837 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jones, or 12 miles south of Wilmot, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wilmot around 855 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bonita. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southeastern Arkansas...and northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
